TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AutomationElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表使用者介面自動化樹狀目錄中的使用者介面自動化項目，並包含可由使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式當成識別項來使用的值。

span.span: Represents a UI Automation element in the UI Automation tree, and contains values used as identifiers by UI Automation client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應於一段[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，而不論基礎實作 (例如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)])。An corresponds to a piece of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], regardless of underlying implementation (such as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in . 這個屬性也可以從擷取或屬性。This property can also be retrieved from the or properties. 快速鍵組合來叫用動作。Accelerator key combinations invoke an action. 例如，CTRL + O 通常用來叫用**開啟**通用對話方塊。For example, CTRL+O is often used to invoke the **Open** file common dialog box. ，有快速鍵按鍵屬性設定一律實作類別。An that has the accelerator key property set always implements the class. 傳回屬性的值屬於型別。Return values of the property are of type . 屬性的預設值為空字串。The default value for the property is an empty string. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值。The following example retrieves the current value of the property. 如果項目不提供，則會傳回預設值。The default value is returned if the element does not provide one. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in . 這個屬性也可以從擷取或屬性。This property can also be retrieved from the or properties. 傳回屬性的值屬於型別。Return values of the property are of type . 屬性的預設值為空字串。The default value for the property is an empty string. 當有項目的預期保持不變，不論本機語言應用程式的任何執行個體中。When it is available the of an element is expected to always be the same in any instance of the application regardless of the local language. 值應該是整個桌面同層級項目中的唯一性，但不是一定是唯一。The value should be unique among sibling elements but not necessarily unique across the entire desktop. 例如，多個執行個體的應用程式或在 Microsoft Windows 檔案總管 中的多個資料夾檢視可能包含具有相同的項目，例如"SystemMenuBar"。For example, multiple instances of an application, or multiple folder views in Microsoft Windows Explorer, may contain elements with the same , such as "SystemMenuBar". 雖然支援一律建議更好的測試能力，這個屬性不是強制性。While support of an is always recommended for better testability, this property is not mandatory. 支援，where建立測試自動化指令碼的 UI 語言不論執行的是很有用。Where it is supported, an is useful for creating test automation scripts that run regardless of UI language. 用戶端應該作任何假設有關s 由其他應用程式。Clients should make no assumptions regarding the s exposed by other applications. 一定不保證能夠穩定跨不同的版本，或應用程式的組建。An is not necessarily guaranteed to be stable across different releases or builds of an application. 執行個體[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]項目中可唯一識別在桌面上依其屬性。Instances of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are uniquely identified on the desktop by their properties. > [!NOTE] > 支援的最上層的應用程式視窗、 衍生自使用者介面自動化項目以外的控制項檢視中的所有使用者介面自動化項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]控制項不會有一個識別碼或 X:uid 和使用者介面自動化項目衍生自[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]控制項沒有控制項 id。 is supported by all UI Automation elements in the control view except top-level application windows, UI Automation elements derived from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] controls that do not have an ID or x:Uid, and UI Automation elements derived from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] controls that do not have a control ID. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取屬性的目前值。The following example retrieves the current value of the property. 如果項目不提供，則會傳回預設值。The default value is returned if the element does not provide one. remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜尋範圍是相對於呼叫該方法的項目。The scope of the search is relative to the element on which the method is called. 在樹狀目錄中所發生的順序，會傳回項目。Elements are returned in the order in which they were encountered in the tree. 搜尋的桌面上的最上層視窗時，務必指定中`scope`，而非。When searching for top-level windows on the desktop, be sure to specify in `scope`, not . 桌面的整個樹狀子目錄搜尋，可以逐一查看數千個項目，會導致堆疊溢位。A search through the entire subtree of the desktop could iterate through thousands of items and lead to a stack overflow. 如果用戶端應用程式可能會嘗試尋找本身使用者介面項目，則您必須進行對所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]另一個執行緒上呼叫。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用找出所有已啟用視窗中的按鈕。The following example shows how to use to locate all enabled buttons in a window. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Point GetClickablePoint() cil managed

summary.span: 在可點按的 上擷取點。

span.span: Retrieves a point on the that can be clicked.

returns.span: 可由用戶端使用以在此元素上按一下之點的實際螢幕座標。

span.span: The physical screen coordinates of a point that can be used by a client to click on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不可點選如果完全遮住其他視窗。An is not clickable if it is completely obscured by another window. 時，可按滿足下列所有條件：An is clickable when it satisfies all the following conditions: - 以程式設計方式顯示，並提供[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄中。It is programmatically visible and available with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. - 它是完整捲動到檢視範圍內父容器，如果有的話。It is scrolled fully into view within its parent container, if any. 如果項目會裁剪，就是可點選不保證。If the element is clipped, there is no guarantee that it is clickable. - 項目不會遮住其他 UI 項目。The element is not obscured by any other UI element. 如果項目會變暗某個 UI 項目，其祖系以外，它可能不能按。If the element is partially obscured by some UI element other than its ancestors, it might not be clickable. - 包含此項目的視窗本身必須為可點按。The window containing the element must itself be clickable. 例如，視窗不可點選如果包含視窗是完全透明的。For example, the window is not clickable if the containing window is completely transparent. 按下滑鼠會按到視窗下方，因此半透明視窗內的任何控制項將不會傳回可點選的點。Mouse clicks will click through to the window underneath, so any controls within the transparent window will not return clickable points. - 如果項目 （例如清單或樹狀結構檢視） 的容器，它必須有一個點，當按下將會導致常常控制項的背景。If the element is a container (such as list or tree view), it must have a point that when clicked will cause the background of the control to be focused. 如果子元素所佔據的容器控制項的每個部分，則不可點選。If every part of the container control is occupied by a child element, it is not clickable. 沒有控制項將會進行任何定義的點按下時保證為可點按的 UI 自動化提供者。There is no guarantee that a control will do anything when clicked on a point defined as clickable by the UI Automation provider. 請考慮改為使用在控制項上執行動作的控制項模式。Consider using control patterns instead to perform actions on controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼會擷取控制項可點選的點，並將系統游標移至該點。The following code retrieves a clickable point for a control and moves the system cursor to that point. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#179](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#179)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#179](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#179)]

span.span: There is no clickable point.

summary.span: 識別版面配置失效時引發的事件。

span.span: Identifies the event that is raised when the layout is invalidated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等識別碼。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in . 每當多個項目的可見性資訊已變更，則項目的容器會引發這個事件。This event is raised by a container of elements whenever the visibility information of many elements has changed. 用戶端會使用此事件為指標，以便重新整理和它可能已快取的項目樹狀結構中的資訊。This event is used by the client as an indicator that it needs to refresh the and information that it may have cached for elements within the tree. 建議的數目的變更會觸發這個事件是 25。The recommended number of changes that triggers this event is 25.
